Creature Type. You are a Humanoid.

Age. Tieflings mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.

Size. Your size is Medium. Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans.

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of red.

Hellish Resistance. You have resistance to fire damage.

Legacy of Blood. When you choose this species, you select one of the various Legacy options which impart unique spell-like abilities. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it when you cast any spell granted by your choosen legacy (choose when you select this species). Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. None of these spells require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

Devil's Tongue. You know the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplViciousMoc]{vicious mockery} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCharmPerso]{charm person} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplEnthrall00]{enthrall} spell once with this trait.

Starting at 5th level, you can cast the darkness spell once with this trait.

Winged Legacy. You have bat-like wings sprouting from your shoulder blades. You have a flying speed of 30 feet while you are not wearing heavy armor (unless the armor is made of a material that removes the Strength Requirement to don).
